data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 5,300 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Al Qadarif.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Qadarif, Sudan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Al Qadarif, Sudan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,369,300 people living in Al Qadarif through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Al Qadarif, Sudan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rufaa people.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Al Qadarif prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Al Qadarif, Sudan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Qadarif, Sudan has a population of 1,369,300.

We estimate Al Qadarif has 5,300 people who might know Jesus, 62,962 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,301,038 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Al Qadarif, Sudan.
